statements: SELECT * FROM FoodCosts WHERE cost > 50
SELECT id, item_name, cost FROM FoodCosts WHERE expense < 20
SELECT item_name, cost, expense FROM FoodCosts WHERE item_name LIKE 'Apple%'
SELECT * FROM FoodCosts ORDER BY cost DESC
SELECT id, SUM(cost) AS total_cost FROM FoodCosts GROUP BY id HAVING total_cost > 100
SELECT item_name, cost FROM FoodCosts WHERE cost > 50 ORDER BY cost DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM FoodCosts WHERE cost + expense > 100 ORDER BY cost ASC
SELECT item_name, cost, expense FROM FoodCosts WHERE cost BETWEEN 30 AND 70 ORDER BY item_name
SELECT DISTINCT item_name FROM FoodCosts WHERE expense < 20
SELECT item_name, cost, expense FROM FoodCosts WHERE cost = 40 OR expense = 10 ORDER BY cost
SELECT * FROM food_costs;
SELECT item_name, cost FROM food_costs WHERE cost > 50;
SELECT expense_date, amount FROM expenses WHERE amount < 100;
SELECT item_name, cost, purchase_date FROM food_costs ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT id, item_name, cost, purchase_date FROM food_costs WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM food_costs WHERE cost > 50 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, cost FROM food_costs WHERE item_name LIKE '%apple%' OR item_name LIKE '%banana%' ORDER BY cost ASC;
SELECT id, item_name, cost FROM food_costs WHERE purchase_date >= '2021-01-01' AND purchase_date <= '2021-12-31' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT SUM(cost) AS total_cost FROM food_costs WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT expense_type, amount, expense_date FROM expenses WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY expense_date ASC;
SELECT id, food_name, cost FROM FoodCosts;
SELECT expense_name, amount FROM Expenses WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT food_name, cost FROM FoodCosts ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT id, food_name, cost FROM FoodCosts WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT food_name, cost FROM FoodCosts WHERE food_name LIKE 'Chicken%';
SELECT food_name, cost FROM FoodCosts WHERE cost > 50 ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT expense_name, amount FROM Expenses WHERE amount < 1000 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT food_name, cost FROM FoodCosts JOIN Profitability ON FoodCosts.id = Profitability.food_cost_id WHERE Profitability.profit > 500 ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT expense_name, amount, profit FROM Expenses JOIN Profitability ON Expenses.id = Profitability.expense_id WHERE profit < 2000 ORDER BY profit ASC;

SELECT food_name, cost, expense_name, amount, profit FROM FoodCosts JOIN Profitability ON FoodCosts.id = Profitability.food_cost_id JOIN Expenses ON Expenses.id = Profitability.expense_id WHERE cost > 50 AND amount < 1000 AND profit > 500 ORDER BY profit DESC, cost ASC;
SELECT * FROM food_costs;
SELECT item_name, cost FROM food_costs ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT id, expense_type, amount FROM expenses WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT food_item, quantity, sale_amount, sale_date FROM sales WHERE sale_amount < 50 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT id, revenue, expenses, profit FROM profitability WHERE profit > 1000;
SELECT * FROM food_costs WHERE cost > 50 ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT item_name, cost FROM food_costs WHERE item_name LIKE 'P%' OR item_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_expenses FROM expenses WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT food_item, quantity, sale_amount FROM sales WHERE sale_amount >= 100 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC, sale_date ASC;
SELECT item_name, cost FROM food_costs WHERE cost < 30 AND item_name NOT LIKE 'V%' ORDER BY item_name ASC, cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM FoodCosts;
SELECT food_item, cost FROM FoodCosts WHERE cost > 50;
SELECT event_date, food_item, cost FROM FoodCosts ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT id, supplier_name, phone_number FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT id, transaction_type, amount, transaction_date FROM Transactions WHERE amount < 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT food_item, cost FROM FoodCosts ORDER BY cost DESC, food_item ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Expenses WHERE amount > 1000 AND expense_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM Suppliers JOIN Transactions ON Suppliers.id = Transactions.id GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING total_transactions > 10 ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue, AVG(profit_margin) AS avg_profit_margin FROM Profitability WHERE profit > 10000;
SELECT expense_type, amount, COUNT(*) AS total_expenses FROM Expenses GROUP BY expense_type, amount ORDER BY total_expenses DESC, amount ASC LIMIT 5;
